title: Pre-commit Hook Cleanup and Standardization
description: Address and resolve all outstanding pre-commit hook failures, including 'fix end of files' issues, 'ruff' errors (E402, B904), and ensure consistent code quality across the entire repository. This task aims to re-enable and pass all pre-commit checks.
acceptance_criteria: All pre-commit hooks pass successfully on the entire repository.
No 'fix end of files' warnings or errors.
No 'ruff' errors (E402, B904, etc.) are reported.
Code formatting is consistent across the repository.
notes: Created to track and resolve pre-commit hook failures that were bypassed during the implementation of the test data strategy.
